metadata.title: Thursday, 11th February, 2021
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
parts: (a) when the tarring of the Lunte-Zakaria-Senga Hill road will commence;
(b) what has caused the delay in commencing the project; and
(c) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development and Social Welfare
parts: (a) whether the Government rendered any form of support to the pupils at Kasempa School for the Disabled, as of July, 2020;
(b) if so, what form of support was rendered;
(c) if no support was rendered, why; and

(d) what measures are being taken to ensure that the pupils at the School are supported.
